name: Cuthbert and the Golden Chalice
overview: Legend tells of a fabled GOLDEN CHALICE that can bring wealth and long life to whoever it belongs being placed at the end of a deep cave. Having heard of these tales Cuthbert sets off to try and collect the chalice, but will he succeed where many others have failed? The cave is filled with deep pits that will mean instant death should he fall in. Other hazards include poisonous snakes, swarms of fast moving bees and giant deadly spiders. Will you be able to take on the challenge and guide Cuthbert to the GOLDEN CHALICE?
